item.title: Help with lag
item.dc:creator: @bam_bam bam bam
item.description:
@bam_bam wrote:

It doesnt lag for me but i have no idea at all what you are trying to doâ€¦

This might work:

[code]program New;

var
x,y: integer;

begin
wait(2000+random(1000))
if(findcolor(x,y,1191968,0,0,336,515))then begin
wait(50+random(50))
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(5000+random(5000))
end;
repeat
//what you want to repeat here
until(false)
end.[/code]

But it seems to me you might want to repeat the find color so in that case you do this:

[code]program New;

var
x,y: integer;

begin
wait(2000+random(1000))
repeat
if(findcolor(x,y,1191968,0,0,336,515))then begin
wait(50+random(50))
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(5000+random(5000))
end;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Help with lag
item.dc:creator: @traitors traitors
item.description:
@traitors wrote:

when i run this basic script

program New; var x,y: integer; begin wait(2000+random(1000)); if(findcolor(x,y,1191968,0,0,336,515))then; wait(50+random(50)); clickmouse(x,y,true); wait(5000+random(5000)); repeat until(false) end.

it lags like crazy any suggestion why and how i can fix it?

Read full topic
